title: Beware of the Animals
description: A short, funny chapter book. Ideal for kids aged between 4 â€“ 8. Perfect for new chapter readers. This story gives the reader a secret insight into how animals interact with each other and tells the funny tale of Archie the ape, Sal the seagull and Leo the sea lion. There is also a moral story behind the laughter, that will please children and adults alike.
author: James Allan
